title: Ticket #299: When condor_rm -f is used, the gridmanager should be notifed
description: When condor_rm -force is used, we don't want Condor to contact the execute side at all. All well and good. However, we should have the schedd contact the gridmanager and/or shadows to that they dump their state about the ripped out jobs. Not doing so results in unexpected (and undesirable) behavior, ala the associated RUST.
creator: tannenba
